name: Wasted Astronaut
description:
[PLAY ONLY IN FULLSCREEN]

Movement: W - A - S - D or arrow keys

Punching: Left mouse click

There was once a nuclear war 20 years ago. Over 90% of the world population had either died due the nuclear radiation or have turned into zombies. But you were one of the 10% who was able to hide in a bunker. Before the nuclear war happened you wanted to become a astronaut, but due to the war you could never fulfill that dream.... Until one day when an unmanned spaceship landed near your bunker that the government had sent out to help bring any survivors to a new planet.

PUNCH YOUR WAY THROUGH THE ZOMBIES, DEFEAT THE BOSS AND GET ACCESS TO THE SPACESHIP!!!

Game made by:

Programmer: Ernst Studio(ErnstGames)

Programmer: Ghostpanther

Music composer/sound designer: makimacaw

2d artist: Blue.wary

2d artist: Pillowgod Games
